name: Colgados- Crazy Strings
description: A simple game(hd720) in which you will hang yourself and depending on your movie, gravity and physics will do their part. Only need 1 mouse button and exceptional ability. Recommended headphones for sound quality. It is a beta version. If it is a little successful we will expand more levels. And if not, we will include some screen in the next game that you will have available soon. Fuc ... CoronaVirus. Please  enjoy and send us your comments and suggestions. I´m in practice with gdevelope5, and your help will be  rewarded!!
